data.eml:eml: Wandering throughout South America: Taxonomic revision of Tradescantia subg. Austrotradescantia (D. R. Hunt) M. Pell. (Commelinaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pellegrini, Marco O. O. (2018): Wandering throughout South America: Taxonomic revision of Tradescantia subg. Austrotradescantia (D. R. Hunt) M. Pell. (Commelinaceae). PhytoKeys 101: 1-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.101.25057, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.101.25057
